title: Experience the Beauty of Lakeside Living
posting_body: We are currently looking for new tenants to join our lovely community.
We have a few that we are currently getting fixed up that will be ready for move in by the end of July.
I'm currently taking applications for 1 Bedroom units, and have a short waitlist for 2 Bedroom units, and will be able to begin accepting applications for the 2 Bedrooms very soon.
We feature large 1 & 2 bedroom apartments located in the Historic city of Clarkston.
We have 1 Bedrooms from $999-$1,150 and 2 bedrooms from $1,050-$1,300 which includes Heat, Water, Sewer and Trash.
Security Deposit is up to 1 & 1/2 months rent, which is based on Credit.
Application fee is $50 per person over 18.
We have applications online and in the office.
All apartments have a stove, Refrigerator, and garbage disposal, plus scenic views of our courtyards or the lake!
We allow 1 cat per unit with a $200 deposit and $30 extra a month.
Please keep in mind all apartments are First Come, First Serve.
We have a lot of interest so act fast so we can ensure you get one of the ones we currently have available!
We are conveniently located close to all major medical, shopping and dining facilities within a minutes drive all for you to enjoy.
We are open Mon-Fri 9:00-5:00PM, feel free to stop by and check out the property or give us a call at
We are very excited to help you find your new favorite apartment!
